mapper.insert: insert into member (m_idx, m_id, m_pw, m_name, m_birth, m_email, m_phone, m_addr, m_date, m_position, m_sex, m_abil, m_foot, m_pic, AUTHORITY) values( member_seq.nextval, #{m_id}, #{m_pw}, #{m_name}, #{m_birth}, #{m_email}, #{m_phone}, #{m_addr}, sysdate, #{m_position}, #{m_sex}, #{m_abil}, #{m_foot}, #{m_pic}, 'normal')
mapper.select: select m_id from member where m_name like #{m_name} and m_email like #{m_email}
select m_pw from member where m_id like #{m_id} and m_email like #{m_email}
